sentences.en: Keep a downwind window open slightly for fresh air.
sentences.cn: 保持顺风窗略微打开以获得新鲜空气。

sentences.en: He attempted to return downwind to the airfield.
sentences.cn: 他试图顺着风返回飞机场。

sentences.en: Warnings were issued to people living downwind of the fire to stay indoors.
sentences.cn: 已经向住在火势下风处的人们发出不要出门的警告。
